typing

Class StaticTypeCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • typing.StaticTypeCheck

  • public class StaticTypeCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    Static type checking for Clite is defined by the functions V and the auxiliary functions typing and typeOf. These functions use the classes in the Abstract Syntax of Clite.
